name: Hollow (itch) (OzoneIsLucky)
description:
A short project I made as a submission to the Taylor University Fall 2019 GameJam. The theme was "parallel worlds", so this game features a girl who is split between two worlds after discovering a strange portal.

Contols: Arrow Keys, X to jump, Z to swap words (after portal)

This was my first GameJam, and I have learned a lot from this experience. In all, I spent about 20 hours making this.
